name: Gumdrop Monster
description: "I'm just a fuzzy monster that likes gum drops as much as the next monster. But why are all these girls chasing me? Yuck! It's not like I'm cute or anything. Far from it! I'm a ferocious beastie! I should probably leave before one of those icky girls catches me.... but first, one more gum drop. Just one more, then I'll go."
